name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Aku Tiki Inn

reviews.text: My family and I just returned from 5 incredible nights at the Best Western Aku Tiki. From the moment we set foot in the beautiful lobby we were treated like family. The staff were so nice to not only my wife and I but to both my children. The rooms were spotless (even the bathroom!!). The breakfast was my kids favorite (a close second to the homemade pizza they make in their kitchen). Susie made sure we had everything we needed poolside and I must say I have never seen a pool as big as the one there not even at the country club. We were sad to leave and can not wait to go back. You sure can't beat the price for everything you get. I hope we can stay 10 days next year!
reviews.title: What a Wonderful Place

likes.liked: — Staff friendliness and cleanliness of entire property

reviews.text: Another great vacation at the Aku Tiki! The staff Mitch, Bobby, Richard, and manager Dale will make you feel at home. Our girls 12 and 15 are swimmers and the pool is the best we have seen up and down the whole beach. The view of the ocean from every room is great. The kitchen is well equiped to prepare meals. Grocery store is right across the street and many restaurants are within a very short distance. Comfortable acommodations + great location + great beach + great pool = great vacation!
reviews.title: Aku Tiki is the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn on our trip to FL this year and it did not disappoint.
reviews.title: Aku Tiki Inn - a little piece of paradise!

likes.liked: — The lush beautiful grounds and view of the beach and ocean, especially at sunrise.
likes.disliked: — It is so far away from Indiana ;-)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the beautiful grounds, to the large, clean rooms, the private balconies, the spacious pool, shuffleboard, basketball, great hot wings (actually medium), free manager's happy hour each evening, the island decor, fantastic location, to being directly on the fantastic Daytona Beach area beach, this is the place to stay if you are stopping in the Daytona Beach area.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

likes.liked: — Clean rooms, friendly staff and manager, Great wireless internet access

reviews.text: The staff is very friendly and competent and the parking is plentiful and well lit.
reviews.title: A life saver!

reviews.text: A few friends and I were staying at the Aku Tiki for a destination wedding. She had reserved a block of rooms at 5 Daytona hotels and we decided to go with this one. It was the cheapest and had the best reviews on Trip Advisor.
reviews.title: Met all of our needs

likes.liked: — The service was excellent and the room size was perfect.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was very easy to find, right on Atlantic Drive near everything the city has to offer. We didn't get to the hotel until after check-in time so our room was waiting for us. There were 4 girls staying in the same room and it was large enough for all of our bags. We had a mini-fridge and a microwave in our room for free although we didn't use it. Our beds were comfortable as well. We were on the first floor right by the pool through our sliding glass door. Each room had their own lounge chairs and the access to the ocean was easy and close.
reviews.title: A good first impression of Daytona Beach

reviews.text: We ate the breakfast buffet one morning and it had many options for a reasonable price. The food was as well as can be expected.
reviews.title: Great Place!!! Loved it

likes.disliked: — nothing yhat I can think of

reviews.text: If you drive a car there the clerk gives you a parking pass to display in your window since parking is limited.
reviews.title: Excellent Golf Package

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had fresh towels everyday and the maids were very friendly. My friend forgot her razor at home and they gave her a very expensive one for free. I was amazed that it wasn't a cheap Bic disposable. There are even free cookies in the lobby.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.disliked: — Far from most places to eat and shop

aka: Best Western Aku Tiki Hotel Daytona Beach
description: A long time area favorite and “Best of the Best” award winning hotel, located directly on a breath taking stretch of Daytona Beach's shoreline. Over sized rooms feature private balcony or patio, 2 queen sized beds and micro-fridge or full kitchen. Rates always include daily Complimentary Cocktail Reception, newspaper, fresh baked cookies, Wi-fi Internet, and use of fitness center. Oceanfront recreation are features 25 yard tile pool, gardens, picnic area, shuffleboard, basketball, and more.
